I purchased the stress for a formal this weekend with a 70s theme. Sadly, I can’t return it because I can’t find the original packaging. As you can see from the photos, there is excessive exposed stitching, hardware you would find on an undergarment visible on the front of the dress, and just overall low quality work. It also fits poorly, do largely to the poor stitching, I believe. Super disappointed.

This was so dark blue, almost black. I wore this for a wedding and luckily the bride loved the color, but never aware that the blue is very dark. This dress was pretty thin, but not see through. It does wrinkle very easily, and doesn't really unwrinkle. The fit is good if you are very busy. True to the size measurments.

This was nice for my best friends outdoor wedding. It is thin and light so quite ideal for the very hot outdoors. The dress was nice but obviously very cheaply made. You can't tell in the pictures but when you get it, the elastic and sewing job up top with the sleeves and collar make it very obvious how cheaply it's made. I wouldn't recommend it for a fancy occasion, more like a summer outing type of dress.
I was again disappointed it looks like a dress for a Mormon and I say disrespectfully it has no style just hangs cheaply made. I cannot recommend anyone with fashion sense to purchase this

评论概述: pleasantly shocked !! but buy a larger size
评论详情: for a $30 dress im shocked. i bought a 3x just to be sure because i could alter it myself if needed. it does run small by clothing standards. fabric is good all things considered. have not yet washed to see if it gets more "flowy" after getting all the chemicals out of it. but very satisfied with the overall look and fit. FYI the strap adjustment is in the front so i will be removing those and just stitching straps in place permanently. the plastic adjustment pieces make it look cheap and like it was a last minute thought. those should have been put in the back or left off. at minimum they should have been same color as dress. it will be great on the cruise we are taking. cheap enough that even if never worn again it wont matter.
Hermoso y fue Perfecto para un matrimonio elegante de noche que tuve. La talla fue perfecta y acorde a las medidas. No tuve que ajustarlo ni siquiera de largo. Me quedó perfecto
This dress is gorgeous. It fit as expected and feels good. The color was as shown in the picture and it's flattering to cover up a bit of extra belly.

Dress was pretty but based on measurements was too small even with elastic!  Had to return
I absolutely love this dress! It flows and is so comfortable!!!! I’m getting more colors…

I was pleasantly surprised at the fit and quality.  I am more of an apple shape and was concernedabout my tummy area but it looked fine, it skimmed over and wasn't too tight in that area.  It was just the right length and comfortable to wear.  I am 5'2", 170 lbs with measurements of 41-38-43, I ordered a Large

2 stars cause it showed up and didn't fall apart I guess. The fit if the dress is nothing like the picture. I tried my size (according to their chart) and tune size up but there was just way less fabric in the chest and sleeve area so nothing sits in the flowy way you'd expect from the picture.  The fabric also feels kinda cheap for the price.

I purchased this dress for a wedding and it did not disappoint. I added a pearl and sequin belt to top off the look. The dress is well made and easy to wash. The color is a dark navy - the photo makes the dress appear to be more of a royal blue. Size ran a little small, but fit.
The dress is beautiful! My biggest complaint was that it wasn't as long or flowy as the photo makes it seem. Still pretty for what I need it for!
Beautiful dress but I had problems getting my arms into sleeves. The dress doesn’t billow like pictures imply. It just falls and doesn’t go out when spinning. Almost like it’s another dress.

Fits perfectly. I removed the lining of the skirt for a photo shoot so it would be more gauzy and thin. With the lining you cannot see through it at all, which is awesome for wearing out and about. Comfortable enough to wear all day. Very flattering for the IBTC crew, although folks with a larger chest may have issues with how the arms are connected.

I highly recommend this dress. I'm going to buy additional colors.

This dress was disappointing. I own a dress in a similar style that I love. But this one is getting returned. The fabric was SHINY, very cheap, almost like a Halloween costume. The fit was not flattering (for me), I thought it was cut way too high in the front and back. It would have been more flattering if it showed more skin. The length also seemed odd. It was shorter than I expected, not quite reaching my ankles. The color was nice. But the dress is not cute. Returning it.
I little see-through, but overall a nice dress.

What a comfortable,  versatile black dress. Used for Halloween costume, and will use for date nights as well. Very happy with this purchase

评论概述: Is not as pictured and runs two sizes too small
评论详情: This product is not at all what I expected. The sleeves are not at ALL loose like pictured.  I bought it a size larger than I needed anticipating them running a bit small, but this one ran two sizes too small. I got it for a wedding coming up, my cousins wedding and I couldn’t hardly breathe in it. The sleeves elastic was so tight it cut off circulation in my arms.  I feel lied to. This company is a lie. 😡

I loved this dress. It was light enough that I wasn’t hot but enough fabric where I never felt exposed. It is really cute and fit me so perfect. I am 5’4” and the dress was long and almost touched the top of my foot but not too long where I was stepping on it.

I am 5'2" ish, 38B,  and roughly 150 lbs and I got the medium after finally finding it in the item description details (which was kinda annoying to look for but it is there). It fits me almost perfectly but it feels a tad tight to put on in the bust area. If you want to put the sleeves on I recommend putting them on as you are put the dress on. The material feels like some kinda generic satin thing, not incredibly fancy but it doesn't feel weak in any place in particular. I have to pick it up just a tiny bit when going up stairs but I like that aesthetic so it doesn't really bother me in case others are worrying about it being long. Came a tiny bit wrinkled but honestly I don't really care. I'm using it for a witch costume for Halloween and for that purpose I think it works!

I am 32 weeks pregnant and this fits well. The top is a bit too big but it still looks nice. The lining inside could be a bit looser but again i have a baby bump. I bought the biggest size just to be on the safe side and i'm glad i did. My bump isnt crazy big but the extra room is nice to have. The material is a little stiff and kind of crunchy but i think a good wash might help. I really love it.
Cheap material! Arms and chest are at least two sizes to small. Don’t waste your time.

It feels a little awkward to get it on, but once on it feels comfortable and I feel pretty thw pink is a good soft pink, but not too pastel. Very flattering color. I have it in black too. I feel it will be nice for weddings right into fall with the sleeves etc.

评论概述: Poor quality, runs small, bad craftsmanship
评论详情: First, if you're using this dress's for anything other than a costume/throw away piece - do NOT get it. Might work for photos that will not zoom in on details.  Where to start? The straps have "adjustable" parts, but maybe half an inch of strap to give way? Like what's the point of an adjustable strap if there's no room to give. [See photo]  Threads were hanging off EVERYWHERE at nearly every seam. The material is cheap and see through. You WILL need to layer this. Some corner pieces weren't even seamed together correctly and literally falling apart [see pic]  If you need something NICE, do NOT order this. Even as a costume piece it's not worth the money. I have no choice but to use it as I need something in two days.

评论概述: I'm 5 2" and got the 2x ... fit great with no alterations.
评论详情: This dress was very comfortable and I didn't need any alterations . I added small fabric roses to cover the buckle on the straps .  I had many compliments.

This dress fit perfectly because I read the reviews and ordered a size down.. yes, it does run big. It is a beautiful dress— great fabric; light and airy but not see-through at all. I am going to order more in different colors! I love this dress.
Very nice dress. The colour is more orange then red.
Was not flowing. Was straight down fabric
I like it. If we go party place My wife uses
Bought for my baby shower. Breathable but not sheer. Very comfy dress but able to dress it up for a special occasions. Fit very well. It doesn’t stretch much.

Bought this dress for a Ballroom showcase dance ( added some sparkles), it flowed beautifully, the light weight of the garment was great. I bought another dress like this one but in different color. Received many compliments on both dresses.

There are raw edges on the fabric at the bottom. There were raw edges on some of the sleeves but not uniformly. The straps were not connected correctly, also they loosen on their own very easily, and they look tacky. Super cheaply made.

In spite of the fact that I immediately sent it back, I'm giving this dress 4 STARS IF YOU HAVE A CERTAIN BODY TYPE.  I got it in the pink in an XL.  I'm SHORT, CHUBBY and HAVE LARGE BREASTS.  If you have this body type, you'll probably be very disappointed in how this looks on you;  kind of large a Sumu wrestler in a pink, floaty dress, if you get my drift.  The bust was very tight and it was long.....almost to the floor.  I'm 5'2".  Honestly, I can see where this would be lovely on a taller, thinner person who doesn't have an ample bust.  It's fairly well made and mine didn't have any obvious flaws except a few loose threads.  The pink color is lovely.....definitely not a blush pink, but more vibrant.

Everything about this dress is wrong. It is so cheaply made and unflattering to the female form. It’s out of proportion and badly represented through the product image. I can not advise against this dress strongly enough.

Okay, I was a tad hesitant, but I'm SO SO SO HAPPY I bought this dress. It's so pretty and flattering. Using as a maternity dress so I can say how it would fit without a baby bump.
